TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit RuntimeReflectionExtensions extends System.Object

summary.para: Provides methods that retrieve information about types at run time.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Reflection.MethodInfo GetMethodInfo (this Delegate del);
.method public static hidebysig class System.Reflection.MethodInfo GetMethodInfo(class System.Delegate del) cil managed

summary.para: Gets an object that represents the method represented by the specified delegate.

returns.para: An object that represents the method.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Reflection.MethodInfo GetRuntimeBaseDefinition (this System.Reflection.MethodInfo method);
.method public static hidebysig class System.Reflection.MethodInfo GetRuntimeBaseDefinition(class System.Reflection.MethodInfo method) cil managed

summary.para: Retrieves an object that represents the specified method on the direct or indirect base class where the method was first declared.

returns.para: An object that represents the specified method's initial declaration on a base class.

Docs.param: The method to retrieve information about.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Reflection.EventInfo GetRuntimeEvent (this Type type, string name);
.method public static hidebysig class System.Reflection.EventInfo GetRuntimeEvent(class System.Type type, string name) cil managed

summary.para: Retrieves an object that represents the specified event.

returns.para: An object that represents the specified event, or null if the event is not found.

Docs.param: The type that contains the event.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<System.Reflection.EventInfo> GetRuntimeEvents (this Type type);
.method public static hidebysig class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<class System.Reflection.EventInfo> GetRuntimeEvents(class System.Type type) cil managed

remarks.para: This method returns all events defined on the specified type, including inherited, non-public, instance, and static events.

summary.para: Retrieves a collection that represents all the events defined on a specified type.

returns.para: A collection of events for the specified type.

Docs.param: The type that contains the events.

summary.para: Retrieves a collection that represents all the fields defined on a specified type.

.method public static hidebysig valuetype System.Reflection.InterfaceMapping GetRuntimeInterfaceMap(class System.Reflection.TypeInfo typeInfo, class System.Type interfaceType) cil managed

The interface to retrieve a mapping for.
